original_text: He will punish them with a big stick. He will use his weapons to attack them. As he does that, there will be happy music from harps and tambourines! He will punish them with a big stick. He will use his weapons to attack them. As he does that, there will be happy music from harps and tambourines!
korean_text: 여호와께서 예정하신 몽둥이를 앗수르 위에 더하실 때마다 소고를 치며 수금을 탈 것이며 그는 전쟁 때에 팔을 들어 그들을 치시리라

sentences.original_text: He will punish them with a big stick.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 큰 막대기로 그들을 벌할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He will use his weapons to attack them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 공격하기 위해 무기를 사용할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: there will be happy music from harps and tambourines!
sentences.korean_translation: 하프와 탬버린에서 즐거운 음악이 있을 것입니다!
